articles.title: Lakes under Mars south pole may not be real - Free Press Journal
articles.description: Subsurface lakes found under Mars' south pole, using data from the European Space Agency's Mars Express orbiter, may not really be lakes at all, argue researchers. Two research teams in 2018, working on data from the Mars Express orbiter announced a surprisin…
articles.content: It revealed dozens of additional bright radar reflections over a far greater range of area and depth than ever before. In some places, they were less than a mile from the surface, where temperatures … [+686 chars]

articles.description: Estonia accepts both Covishield and Covaxin as valid against Covid-19 as far as travellers are concerned. | Latest News India

articles.author: RNZ News
articles.title: England to meet Denmark at European Championships - RNZ
articles.description: Harry Kane struck twice as England thrashed Ukraine 4-0 to reach their first European Championship semi-final since 1996 and set up a clash with Denmark.

articles.title: COVID: Europe races to vaccinate amid surge in Delta variant - msnNOW
articles.description: Experts predict that the delta variant could become the predominant strain in Europe by August. Many are calling for a more comprehensive vaccination campaign to prevent the spread of the highly transmissible mutation.
